patthana5.2:1.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.2:2.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.2:3.1: Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
patthana5.2:4.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana5.2:5.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.2:6.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe adhipatiyā cattāri …pe… upanissaye cattāri …pe… avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:7.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.2:8.1: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.2:9.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.2:10.1: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:11.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)

patthana5.2:13.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… āsevane dve …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:16.1: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.2:18.1: Vipākaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana5.2:19.1: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana5.2:20.1: Vipākaṃ abyākatañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.2:21.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ …pe… sampayutte cattāri …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:22.1: Anupādinnupādāniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.2:23.1: Anupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnaanupādāniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.2:25.1: Anupādinnupādāniyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:31.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:32.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:33.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve.)
patthana5.2:34.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)
patthana5.2:35.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.2:36.1: Hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana5.2:37.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana5.2:38.1: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri.
patthana5.2:39.1: Avitakkaavicāraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)

patthana5.2:41.1: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ kusalañca avitakkaavicāraṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ …pe… savitakkasavicāraṃ kusalañca avitakkavicāramattaṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.2:43.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:48.1: Hetuyā sattatiṃsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe aṭṭhavīsa …pe… purejāte āsevane ekādasa …pe… avigate sattatiṃsa. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:61.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana5.2:117.1: Uppanno akusalo dhammo uppannassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Sabbattha ekaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:118.1: Uppanno abyākato dhammo uppannassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.2:119.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… upanissaye tīṇi …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:120.1: Paccuppanno kusalo dhammo paccuppannassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)
patthana5.2:121.1: Paccuppanno akusalo dhammo paccuppannassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Sabbattha ekaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:122.1: Paccuppanno abyākato dhammo paccuppannassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana5.2:123.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… upanissaye tīṇi …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:124.1: Atītārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.2:125.1: Anāgatārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.2:126.1: Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Sabbattha tīṇi. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:127.1: Atītārammaṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.2:128.1: Anāgatārammaṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.2:129.1: Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Sabbattha tīṇi. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:130.1: Atītārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.2:131.1: Anāgatārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.2:132.1: Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Sabbattha tīṇi. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:133.1: Ajjhattaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.2:134.1: Bahiddhā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:135.1: Ajjhattaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.2:136.1: Bahiddhā akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:137.1: Ajjhattaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.2:138.1: Bahiddhā abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:139.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:140.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:141.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:142.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)
patthana5.2:143.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)
patthana5.2:144.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Ekaṃ.)
patthana5.2:145.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Dve.)
patthana5.2:146.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Tīṇi.)
patthana5.2:147.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Cattāri.)
patthana5.2:148.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Pañca.)
patthana5.2:149.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Cha.)
patthana5.2:150.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Satta.)
patthana5.2:151.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Satta.)
patthana5.2:152.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ abyākatañca anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Satta.) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.2:153.1: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… avigate ekavīsa. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
